code: import React from'react';import{Shield,Bell,Clock,Settings}from'lucide-react';import'../styles/WhyBookSection.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WhyBookSection=()=>{const features=[{title:"Instant & Full Refunds",description:"with Assured Guarantee",icon:Shield},{title:"Save up to 40%",description:"with Intelligent Fare Alerts",icon:Bell},{title:"Track Flight Status",description:"Gate & Baggage Updates",icon:Clock},{title:"24x7 Support",description:"Customer Service",icon:Settings}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"why-book-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"why-book-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Why Book With iairgo?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"features-grid",children:features.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"icon-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(feature.icon,{className:"icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:feature.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:feature.description})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"copyright",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"2024 Iairgo - \xA9 All rights reserved"})})]})});};export default WhyBookSection;
